title: Dear Riot, acknowledge the connection issues
body:
i cant log in to the game server, telling me i have http issues and i need to go over the conneciton issues page

now i'd believe your brand new shiny client if i weren't a tier 3 network engineer for the state i live in.
So now that we've got that out of the way, could you possibly start responding to these posts with more than just "check the connection issues page"
It is no individuals fault that tons of us are having the EXACT same issue when trying to log in.
Do your maintenance. Your game is unplayable

replies.body:
No, it's been fixed now. didn't see an update so it had to be server side i guess.

I'm glad that it has been acknowledged.
Thank you Porocles.
I'm not really sure what happened, but it looks like some players weren't able to login.  I'm unable to see anymore issues being reported, though.  Is this still happening for you?

It just happened. Give them some time to actually find out what went wrong.
Also, it'd help to give some info. It might be regional/affected by a peering network or something.

tracerts, your ISP, and such help.


That said, I DO AGREE that they should actually acknowledge this as an actual problem on their end. There's too many people who got kicked offline and can't login (myself included) that it's far beyond the possibility of it being one person's net.
I've had this issue since rougly 1 am. so it's a total of 13 hours i've been down and i see no acknowledgement. i'm not shitting down anyones throat
Its been an hour tops, and you are already shitting down their throats. Go for a walk and relax, im sure they are addressing it.
